(2012). We have extended the dataset to 2010 using the same methodology and have amended some of the original data after double-checking it with secondary sources. Capital account: Qualitative indicators of constraints on financial credits and personal capital transactions of residents and financial credits to non-residents, as well as the use of multiple exchange rates.
